1 #include <ros/ros.h>
2 #include <tf/tf.h>
3 #include <geometry_msgs/PoseWithCovarianceStamped.h>
4 #include <base_trajectory_analytical/planner_base.h>
5 #include <base_trajectory_analytical/spiral_planner.h>
6 #include <base_trajectory_analytical/lissajous_planner.h>
7 #include <base_trajectory_analytical/primitive_planner.h>
8 
9 enum ControllerTypes{
10  lissajous=0,
11  spiral=1,
12  primitive=2
13 };
14 
15 
16 int main(int argc,char**argv)
17 {
18  //Choose planner
19  ros::init(argc,argv,"planner_node");
20 
21  ros::NodeHandle nh;
22  PlannerBase* planner;
23 
24  int type;
25  ros::NodeHandle priv("~");
26  if(!priv.getParam("type",type))
27  {
28  ROS_ERROR("Could not find parameter 'type' for planner");
29  return 0;
30 
31  }
32  bool pause;
33  if(!priv.getParam("pause",pause))
34  {
35  pause=true;
36  }
37 
38  switch(type)
39  {
40  case lissajous:
41  {
42  ROS_INFO("Starting LissajousPlanner!");
43  planner=new LissajousPlanner(nh);
44  break;
45  }
46  case spiral:
47  {
48  ROS_INFO("Starting Spiral Planner");
49  planner=new Spiralplanner(nh);
50  }
51  case primitive:
52  {
53  ROS_INFO("Starting Primitive Planner");
54  planner=new PrimitivePlanner(nh);
55  }
56  default:
57  {
58  return 0;
59  }
60 
61 
62  }
63 
64 
65  geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped pose;
66  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Waiting for start_pose");
67  pose=*ros::topic::waitForMessage<geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped>("start_pose");
68  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Got start_pose");
69 
70  tf::Pose reference;
71  tf::poseMsgToTF(pose.pose.pose,reference);
72 
73  planner->load();
74  planner->setStartPose(reference);
75 
76  if(!pause)
77  {
78  planner->start();
79  }
80  ros::spin();
81  delete planner;
82 }
